SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ARENA
The ARENA class is the entry point or launcher for the Arena Game.
BattleFrame
BattleFrame is GUI implementation of the precursor classes battlemanager and PlayerGladiator in v1.
BattleLogDAO
BattleLogDAO handles and parses all battle log operations.
BattleManager
Handles battles between the player and an enemy gladiator.
DatabaseManager
The DatabaseManager class handles the connection and management of an embedded database Responsibilities: - Create and manage the connection to the database - Create a database if one doesn't exist (and let the user know) - Provide methods for closing or altering the database connection
EnemyGladiator
EnemyGladiator represents an AI-controlled gladiator.
FileManager
FileManager handles all file operations for the game.
GameMenu
GameMenu handles displaying menus, user interactions with those menus and handles processing input for the ARENA game.
Gladiator
Abstract base class for all gladiators.
GladiatorDAO
GladiatorDAO handles database changes for enemy gladiators Responsibilities: - Create and manage GLADIATORS table - Add and retrieve records - Initialize default GLADIATORS table if it is not present
Inventory
Inventory stores and manages items for a gladiator.
Item
Item represents a usable object in the game.
MainMenuFrame
MainMenuFrame is the J Frame based main GUI - this class replaces the CUI handling "GameMenu" class from v1 Responsibilities: - Display main menu selections - Handle user inputs via GUI elements - Connect to DAO (data access object) classes when data operations needed
PlayerDAO
PlayerDAO (direct access object) manages all database methods and functions related to player data Responsibilities: - Create PLAYERS table in arenaDB if one does not exist - Insert new players into the table - Retrieve and update player scores as needed - Fetch player records when requested
PlayerGladiator
PlayerGladiator represents the human-controlled gladiator.
TestBattleLogDAO
 
TestDatabaseConnection
Quick self-test for DatabaseManager connection.
TestGladiatorDAO
 
TestPlayerDAO
